metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20478 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In ruamel.yaml through 0.16.7, the load method allows remote code execution if the application calls this method with an untrusted argument. In other words, this issue affects developers who are unaware of the need to use methods such as safe_load in these use cases.

criterions.comment: ruamel.yaml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
